System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return 176|        
177|        // Get students for selected class
178|        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);
179|        
180|        if (students.isEmpty()) {
181|            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");
182|            System.exit(1);
183|        }
184|        
185|        // Display students
186|        System.out.println("Students in class:");
187|        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {
188|            Student student = students.get(i);
189|            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + 
190|                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");
191|        }
192|    }
193|    
194|    /**
195|     * Step 5: User selects student and four months
196|     */

199|

This program simulates an administrator viewing a student\'s report card.\n * It follows the sequence: select academic year -> choose class -> select student and months -> display report.\n */\npublic class ViewOnePage {\n    \n    // Scanner for user input\n    private static Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    \n    // Simulated SMOS server connection\n    private static SMOSServer initializeSMOSConnection();\n            \n            // Step 1: User selects academic year\n            selectAcademicYear();\n            \n            // Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n            displayClassesWithReportCards();\n            \n            // Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n            choosePupilClass();\n            \n            // System.err.println("Error occurred: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            // Postcondition: User stops connection to SMOS server\n            stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Academic Year ---");\n        \n        // Get available academic years from server\n        List<AcademicYear> academicYears = smosServer.getAvailableAcademicYears();\n        \n        if (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. This program simulates an administrator viewing a student\'s report card.\n * It follows the sequence: select academic year -> choose class -> select student and months -> display report.\n */\npublic class ViewOnePage {\n    \n    // Scanner for user input\n    private static Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    \n    // Simulated SMOS server connection\n    private static SMOSServer stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFirstName() {\n        return firstName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getLastName() {\n        return lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAcademicYear() {\n        return academicYear;\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getMonths() {\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    public Map<String, String> getGrades() {\n        return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return overallGrade;\n    }\n    \n    public String getPerformanceStatus() {\n        return performanceStatus;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class simulating SMOS server connection and data retrieval\n */\nclass SMOSServer {\n    private boolean connected = false;\n    \n    // Simulated data storage\n    private List<AcademicYear> academicYears;\n    private List<Class> classes;\n    private List<Student> students;\n    private Map<String, ReportCard> reportCards;\n    \n    public SMOSServer() {\n        initializeData();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Initialize simulated data\n     */\n    private void initializeData() {\n        // Initialize academic years\n        academicYears = new ArrayList<>();\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY1", "2023", "2024"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY2", "2022", "2023"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY3", "2021", "2022"));\n        \n        // Initialize classes\n        classes = new ArrayList<>();\n        classes.add(new Class("C1", "Class 10A", 10, "Mr. Smith"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C2", "Class 10B", 10, "Ms. Johnson"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C3", "Class 11A", 11, "Dr. Williams"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C4", "Class 11B", 11, "Mrs. Brown"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C5", "Class 12A", 12, "Mr. Davis"));\n        \n        // Initialize students\n        students = new ArrayList<>();\n        students.add(new Student("S101", "John", "Doe"));\n        students.add(new Student("S102", "Jane", "Smith"));\n        students.add(new Student("S103", "Robert", "Johnson"));\n        students.add(new Student("S104", "Emily", "Williams"));\n        students.add(new Student("S105", "Michael", "Brown"));\n        students.add(new Student("S106", "Sarah", "Davis"));\n        students.add(new Student("S107", "David", "Miller"));\n        students.add(new Student("S108", "Lisa", "Wilson"));\n        \n        // Initialize report cards\n        reportCards = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        // Sample report card data\n        Map<String, String> grades1 = new HashMap<>();\n        grades1.put("Mathematics", "A");\n        grades1.put("Science", "B+");\n        grades1.put("English", "A-");\n        grades1.put("History", "B");\n        grades1.put("Physical Education", "A");\n        \n        List<String> months1 = List.of("September", "October", "November", "December");\n        \n        ReportCard report1 = new ReportCard(\n            "John Doe", "Class 10A", "2023-2024",\n            months1, grades1,\n 313|        if (smosServer != null) {

321| * Class representing a student
322| */
323|class Student {
324|    private String studentId;
325|    private String firstName;
326|    private String lastName;
327|    
328|    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {
329|        this.studentId = studentId;
330|        this.firstName = firstName;
331|        this.lastName = lastName;
332|    }
333|    
334|    public String getStudentId() {
335|        return studentId;
336|    }
337|    
338|    public String getFirstName() {
339|        return firstName;
340|    }
341|    
342|    public String getLastName() {
343|        return lastName;
344|    }
345|    
346|    public String getFullName() {
347|        return firstName + " " + lastName;
348|    }
349|}

The new_content must be a complete block of code. Example 1: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to replace line 2 and line 3 edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"new content\\", ) This will replace the second line 2 and line 3 with \\"new content\\". The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002|new content 003|contain i ``` Example 2: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to remove the line 2 and line 3. edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"\\", ) This will remove line 2 and line 3. The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002| 003|contain i ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, first_replaced_line_number: int, first_replaced_line_content: str, last_replaced_line_number: int, last_replaced_line_content: str, new_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name (str): The name of the file to edit. first_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to start the edit at, starting from 1. first_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the start replace line, according to the first_replaced_line_number. last_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to end the edit at (inclusive), starting from 1. last_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the end replace line, according to the last_replaced_line_number. new_content (str): The text to replace the current selection with, must conform to PEP8 standards. The content in the start line and end line will also be replaced."}, "find_file": {"type": "function", "description": "Finds all files with the given name in the specified directory. That is, the new content will start at the beginning of the specified line, and the existing content of that line will be moved down. This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. Please use append_file instead, For example, if the file has the following content: ``` 001|contain g 002|contain h 003|contain i 004|contain j ``` and you call insert_content_at_line( file_name=\'file.txt\', line_number=2, insert_content=\'new line\' ) the file will be updated to: ``` 001|contain g 002|new line 003|contain h 004|contain i 005|contain j ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, line_number: int, insert_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name: (str): The name of the file to edit. line_number (int): The line number (starting from 1) to insert the content after. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. This program simulates an administrator viewing a student\'s report card.\n * It follows the sequence: select academic year -> choose class -> select student and months -> display report.\n */\npublic class ViewOnePage {\n    \n    // Scanner for user input\n    private static Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    \n    // Simulated SMOS server connection\n    private static SMOSServer stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Academic Year ---");\n        \n        // Get available academic years from server\n        List<AcademicYear> academicYears = smosServer.getAvailableAcademicYears();\n        \n        if (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFirstName() {\n        return firstName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getLastName() {\n        return lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAcademicYear() {\n        return academicYear;\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getMonths() {\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    public Map<String, String> getGrades() {\n        return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return overallGrade;\n    }\n    \n    public String getPerformanceStatus() {\n        return performanceStatus;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class simulating SMOS server connection and data retrieval\n */\nclass This program simulates an administrator viewing a student\'s report card.\n * It follows the sequence: select academic year -> choose class -> select student and months -> display report.\n */\npublic class ViewOnePage {\n    \n    // Scanner for user input\n    private static Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    \n    // Simulated SMOS server connection\n    private static SMOSServer {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFirstName() {\n        return firstName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getLastName() {\n        return lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAcademicYear() {\n        return academicYear;\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getMonths() {\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    public Map<String, String> getGrades() {\n        return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return overallGrade;\n    }\n    \n    public String getPerformanceStatus() {\n        return performanceStatus;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class simulating SMOS server connection and data retrieval\n */\nclass students;\n    private Map<String, ReportCard> reportCards;\n    \n    public SMOSServer() {\n        initializeData();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Initialize simulated data\n     */\n    private void initializeData() {\n        // Initialize academic years\n        academicYears = new ArrayList<>();\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY1", "2023", "2024"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY2", "2022", "2023"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY3", "2021", "2022"));\n        \n        // Initialize classes\n        classes = new students\n        students = new ArrayList<>();\n        students.add(new Student("S101", "John", "Doe"));\n        students.add(new Student("S102", "Jane", "Smith"));\n        students.add(new Student("S103", "Robert", "Johnson"));\n        students.add(new Student("S104", "Emily", "Williams"));\n        students.add(new Student("S105", "Michael", "Brown"));\n        students.add(new Student("S106", "Sarah", "Davis"));\n        students.add(new Student("S107", "David", "Miller"));\n        students.add(new Student("S108", "Lisa", "Wilson"));\n        \n        // Initialize report cards\n        reportCards = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        // Sample report card data\n        Map<String, String> grades1 = new HashMap<>();\n        grades1.put("Mathematics", "A");\n        grades1.put("Science", "B+");\n        grades1.put("English", "A-");\n        grades1.put("History", "B");\n        grades1.put("Physical Education", "A");\n        \n        List<String> months1 =
