System.err.println("Error occurred: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            // Postcondition: User stops connection to SMOS server\n            stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Academic Year ---");\n        \n        // Get available academic years from server\n        List<AcademicYear> academicYears = smosServer.getAvailableAcademicYears();\n        \n        if (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFirstName() {\n        return firstName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getLastName() {\n        return lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return " +\n                  "She shows great analytical skills and works well in group projects.",\n            "A", "Outstanding"\n        );\n        \n        reportCards.put("S102_2023-2024_Jan-Apr", report2);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Connects to the SMOS server.\n     */\n    public void connect() {\n        connected = true;\n        System.out.println("SMOS Server: Connection established.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Disconnects from the SMOS server.\n     */\n    public void disconnect() {\n        connected = false;\n        System.out.println("SMOS Server: Connection terminated.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the server is connected.\n     * \n     * @return true if connected, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean isConnected() {\n        return connected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves all available academic years from the server.\n     * \n     * @return List of AcademicYear objects\n     */\n    public List<AcademicYear> getAvailableAcademicYears() {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve academic years.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(academicYears);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves classes for a given academic year.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year to filter classes\n     * @return List of Class objects for the given academic year\n     */\n    public List<Class> getClassesForAcademicYear(AcademicYear academicYear) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve classes.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, all classes are available for all academic years.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by academic year.\n        return new ArrayList<>(classes);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves students for a given class.\n     * \n     * @param cls The class to filter students\n     * @return List of Student objects in the given class\n     */\n    public List<Student> getStudentsForClass(Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve students.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, we return all students regardless of class.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by class.\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves available months for report card generation based on academic year and class.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param cls The class\n     * @return List of available months as strings\n     */\n    public List<String> getAvailableMonths(AcademicYear academicYear, Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve available months.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // Simulated available months\n        List<String> months = new ArrayList<>();\n        months.add("September");\n        months.add("October");\n        months.add("November");\n        months.add("December");\n        months.add("January");\n        months.add("February");\n        months.add("March");\n        months.add("April");\n        months.add("May");\n        months.add("June");\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves a report card for a specific student, academic year, and months.\n     * \n     * @param student The student\n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param months The list of months for the report\n     * @return ReportCard object if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public ReportCard getReportCard(Student student, AcademicYear academicYear, List<String> months) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve report card.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        // Generate a key based on student ID, academic year, and months\n        String key = student.getStudentId() + "_" + academicYear.getYearRange() + "_" +\n                     String.join("-", months.subList(0, Math.min(4, months.size())));\n        \n        // Return the report card if it exists\n        return reportCards.get(key);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a new report card to the simulated database (for testing/extensibility).\n     * \n     * @param key The unique key for the report card\n     * @param reportCard The ReportCard object to add\n     */\n    public void addReportCard(String key, ReportCard reportCard) {\n        reportCards.put(key, reportCard);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns a string representation of the SMOS server status.\n     * \n     * @return String indicating connection status\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "SMOSServer [connected=" + connected + \n               ", academicYears=" + academicYears.size() +\n               ", classes=" + classes.size() +\n               ", students=" + students.size() +\n               ", reportCards=" + reportCards.size() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. The new_content must be a complete block of code. Example 1: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to replace line 2 and line 3 edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"new content\\", ) This will replace the second line 2 and line 3 with \\"new content\\". The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002|new content 003|contain i ``` Example 2: Given a file \\"/workspace/example.txt\\" with the following content: ``` 001|contain f 002|contain g 003|contain h 004|contain i ``` EDITING: If you want to remove the line 2 and line 3. edit_file_by_replace( \\"/workspace/example.txt\\", first_replaced_line_number=2, first_replaced_line_content=\\"contain g\\", last_replaced_line_number=3, last_replaced_line_content=\\"contain h\\", new_content=\\"\\", ) This will remove line 2 and line 3. The resulting file will be: ``` 001|contain f 002| 003|contain i ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, first_replaced_line_number: int, first_replaced_line_content: str, last_replaced_line_number: int, last_replaced_line_content: str, new_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name (str): The name of the file to edit. first_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to start the edit at, starting from 1. first_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the start replace line, according to the first_replaced_line_number. last_replaced_line_number (int): The line number to end the edit at (inclusive), starting from 1. last_replaced_line_content (str): The content of the end replace line, according to the last_replaced_line_number. new_content (str): The text to replace the current selection with, must conform to PEP8 standards. The content in the start line and end line will also be replaced."}, "find_file": {"type": "function", "description": "Finds all files with the given name in the specified directory. That is, the new content will start at the beginning of the specified line, and the existing content of that line will be moved down. This operation will NOT modify the content of the lines before or after the given line number. This function can not insert content the end of the file. Please use append_file instead, For example, if the file has the following content: ``` 001|contain g 002|contain h 003|contain i 004|contain j ``` and you call insert_content_at_line( file_name=\'file.txt\', line_number=2, insert_content=\'new line\' ) the file will be updated to: ``` 001|contain g 002|new line 003|contain h 004|contain i 005|contain j ``` ", "signature": "(self, file_name: str, line_number: int, insert_content: str) -> str", "parameters": "Args: file_name: (str): The name of the file to edit. line_number (int): The line number (starting from 1) to insert the content after. an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. This program simulates an administrator viewing a student\'s report card.\n * It follows the sequence: select academic year -> choose class -> select student and months -> display report.\n */\npublic class ViewOnePage {\n    \n    // Scanner for user input\n    private static Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    \n    // Simulated SMOS server connection\n    private static SMOSServer System.err.println("Error occurred: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            // Postcondition: User stops connection to SMOS server\n            stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Academic Year ---");\n        \n        // Get available academic years from server\n        List<AcademicYear> academicYears = smosServer.getAvailableAcademicYears();\n        \n        if (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFirstName() {\n        return firstName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getLastName() {\n        return lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getFullName() {\n        return firstName + " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAcademicYear() {\n        return academicYear;\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getMonths() {\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    public Map<String, String> getGrades() {\n        return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return overallGrade;\n    }\n    \n    public String getPerformanceStatus() {\n        return performanceStatus;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class simulating SMOS server connection and data retrieval\n */\nclass classes, students, and report cards.\n * It provides methods to connect/disconnect and retrieve data for the report card system.\n */\npublic class SMOSServer {\n    private boolean connected = false;\n    \n    // Simulated data storage\n    private List<AcademicYear> academicYears;\n    private List<Class> classes;\n    private List<Student> students;\n    private Map<String, ReportCard> reportCards;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for SMOSServer. Initializes the simulated data.\n     */\n    public SMOSServer() {\n        initializeData();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Initializes simulated data including academic years, classes, students, and report cards.\n     */\n    private void initializeData() {\n        // Initialize academic years\n        academicYears = new ArrayList<>();\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY1", "2023", "2024"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY2", "2022", "2023"));\n        academicYears.add(new AcademicYear("AY3", "2021", "2022"));\n        \n        // Initialize classes\n        classes = new ArrayList<>();\n        classes.add(new Class("C1", "Class 10A", 10, "Mr. Smith"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C2", "Class 10B", 10, "Ms. Johnson"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C3", "Class 11A", 11, "Dr. Williams"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C4", "Class 11B", 11, "Mrs. Brown"));\n        classes.add(new Class("C5", "Class 12A", 12, "Mr. Davis"));\n        \n        // Initialize students\n        students = new ArrayList<>();\n        students.add(new Student("S101", "John", "Doe"));\n        students.add(new Student("S102", "Jane", "Smith"));\n        students.add(new Student("S103", "Robert", "Johnson"));\n        students.add(new Student("S104", "Emily", "Williams"));\n        students.add(new Student("S105", "Michael", "Brown"));\n        students.add(new Student("S106", "Sarah", "Davis"));\n        students.add(new Student("S107", "David", "Miller"));\n        students.add(new Student("S108", "Lisa", "Wilson"));\n        \n        //   \n        ReportCard report1 = new ReportCard(\n            "John Doe", "Class 10A", "2023-2024",\n            months1, grades1,\n            85, 5, "John has shown excellent progress in Mathematics and Physical Education. " +\n                  "He participates actively in class discussions and completes assignments on time. " +\n                  "Could improve focus in Science classes.",\n            "A-", "Excellent"\n        );\n        \n        reportCards.put("S101_2023-2024_Sep-Dec", report1);\n        \n        // Additional sample report card for Jane Smith\n        Map<String, String> grades2 = new HashMap<>();\n        grades2.put("Mathematics", "B+");\n        grades2.put("Science", "A");\n        grades2.put("English", "A");\n        grades2.put("History", "A-");\n        grades2.put("Physical Education", "B");\n        \n        List<String> months2 = new ArrayList<>();\n        months2.add("January");\n        months2.add("February");\n        months2.add("March");\n        months2.add("April");\n        \n        ReportCard report2 = new ReportCard(\n            "Jane Smith", "Class 10B", "2023-2024",\n            months2, grades2,\n            90, 2, "Jane is a diligent student with strong performance in Science and English. " +\n                  "She shows great analytical skills and works well in group projects.",\n            "A", "Outstanding"\n        );\n        \n        reportCards.put("S102_2023-2024_Jan-Apr", report2);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Connects to the SMOS server.\n     */\n    public void connect() {\n        connected = true;\n        System.out.println("SMOS Server: Connection established.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Disconnects from the SMOS server.\n     */\n    public void disconnect() {\n        connected = false;\n        System.out.println("SMOS Server: Connection terminated.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the server is connected.\n     * \n     * @return true if connected, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean isConnected() {\n        return connected;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves all available academic years from the server.\n     * \n     * @return List of AcademicYear objects\n     */\n    public List<AcademicYear> getAvailableAcademicYears() {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve academic years.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(academicYears);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves classes for a given academic year.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year to filter classes\n     * @return List of Class objects for the given academic year\n     */\n    public List<Class> getClassesForAcademicYear(AcademicYear academicYear) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve classes.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, all classes are available for all academic years.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by academic year.\n        return new ArrayList<>(classes);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves students for a given class.\n     * \n     * @param cls The class to filter students\n     * @return List of Student objects in the given class\n     */\n    public List<Student> getStudentsForClass(Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve students.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, we return all students regardless of class.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by class.\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves available months for report card generation based on academic year and class.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param cls The class\n     * @return List of available months as strings\n     */\n    public List<String> getAvailableMonths(AcademicYear academicYear, Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve available months.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // Simulated available months\n        List<String> months = new ArrayList<>();\n        months.add("September");\n        months.add("October");\n        months.add("November");\n        months.add("December");\n        months.add("January");\n        months.add("February");\n        months.add("March");\n        months.add("April");\n        months.add("May");\n        months.add("June");\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves a report card for a specific student, academic year, and months.\n     * \n     * @param student The student\n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param months The list of months for the report\n     * @return ReportCard object if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public ReportCard getReportCard(Student student, AcademicYear academicYear, List<String> months) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve report card.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        // Generate a key based on student ID, academic year, and months\n        String key = student.getStudentId() + "_" + academicYear.getYearRange() + "_" +\n                     String.join("-", months.subList(0, Math.min(4, months.size())));\n        \n        // Return the report card if it exists\n        return reportCards.get(key);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a new report card to the simulated database (for testing/extensibility).\n     * \n     * @param key The unique key for the report card\n     * @param reportCard The ReportCard object to add\n     */\n    public void addReportCard(String key, ReportCard reportCard) {\n        reportCards.put(key, reportCard);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns a string representation of the SMOS server status.\n     * \n     * @return String indicating connection status\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "SMOSServer [connected=" + connected + \n               ", academicYears=" + academicYears.size() +\n               ", classes=" + classes.size() +\n               ", students=" + students.size() +\n               ", reportCards=" + reportCards.size() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Step 4: System displays list of class students\n            displayClassStudents();\n            \n            // Step 5: User selects student and four months\n            selectStudentAndMonths();\n            \n            // Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n            displayStudentReport();\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.err.println("Error occurred: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n        } finally {\n            // Postcondition: User stops connection to SMOS server\n            stopSMOSConnection();\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 0: Initialize connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void initializeSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Initializing SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        smosServer = new SMOSServer();\n        smosServer.connect();\n        System.out.println("Connected to SMOS server successfully.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 1: User selects academic year\n     */\n    private static void selectAcademicYear() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Academic Year ---");\n        \n        // Get available academic years from server\n        List<AcademicYear> academicYears = smosServer.getAvailableAcademicYears();\n        \n        if (academicYears.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No academic years available.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display available academic years\n        System.out.println("Available Academic Years:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < academicYears.size(); i++) {\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + academicYears.get(i).getYearRange());\n        }\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter your choice (1-" + academicYears.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > academicYears.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedAcademicYear = academicYears.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected academic year: " + selectedAcademicYear.getYearRange());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 2: System displays list of classes with "report cards" button\n     */\n    private static void displayClassesWithReportCards() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2: Available Classes ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        if (classes.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No classes available for the selected academic year.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display classes with "report cards" button indicator\n        System.out.println("Classes with report cards available:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < classes.size(); i++) {\n            Class cls = classes.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + cls.getClassName() + \n                             " (Grade: " + cls.getGradeLevel() + \n                             ") - [REPORT CARDS]");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 3: User chooses pupil class\n     */\n    private static void choosePupilClass() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 3: Choose Pupil Class ---");\n        \n        // Get classes for selected academic year\n        List<Class> classes = smosServer.getClassesForAcademicYear(selectedAcademicYear);\n        \n        // Get user selection with validation\n        int choice = 0;\n        while (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter class number (1-" + classes.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (choice < 1 || choice > classes.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedClass = classes.get(choice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected class: " + selectedClass.getClassName());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 4: System displays list of class students\n     */\n    private static void displayClassStudents() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Students in " + selectedClass.getClassName() + " ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        if (students.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No students found in this class.");\n            System.exit(1);\n        }\n        \n        // Display students\n        System.out.println("Students in class:");\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            System.out.println((i + 1) + ". " + student.getFullName() + \n                             " (ID: " + student.getStudentId() + ")");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 5: User selects student and four months\n     */\n    private static void selectStudentAndMonths() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Select Student and Four Months ---");\n        \n        // Get students for selected class\n        List<Student> students = smosServer.getStudentsForClass(selectedClass);\n        \n        // Select student\n        int studentChoice = 0;\n        while (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n            System.out.print("Enter student number (1-" + students.size() + "): ");\n            try {\n                studentChoice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine());\n                if (studentChoice < 1 || studentChoice > students.size()) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid choice. Please try again.");\n                }\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        selectedStudent = students.get(studentChoice - 1);\n        System.out.println("Selected student: " + selectedStudent.getFullName());\n        \n        // Select four months\n        System.out.println("\\nSelect four months for the report:");\n        List<String> availableMonths = smosServer.getAvailableMonths(selectedAcademicYear, selectedClass);\n        \n        if (availableMonths.size() < 4) {\n            System.out.println("Warning: Only " + availableMonths.size() + " months available.");\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Available months: " + String.join(", ", availableMonths));\n        \n        selectedMonths.clear();\n        for (int i = 0; i < 4 && i < availableMonths.size(); i++) {\n            String month;\n            do {\n                System.out.print("Enter month " + (i + 1) + " (from available months): ");\n                month = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n                \n                if (!availableMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Invalid month. Please choose from available months.");\n                } else if (selectedMonths.contains(month)) {\n                    System.out.println("Month already selected. Please choose a different month.");\n                } else {\n                    selectedMonths.add(month);\n                    break;\n                }\n            } while (true);\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Selected months: " + String.join(", ", selectedMonths));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Step 6: System displays chosen student report for selected four months\n     */\n    private static void displayStudentReport() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Student Report Card ---");\n        System.out.println("=====================================");\n        \n        // Get report card for selected student and months\n        ReportCard reportCard = smosServer.getReportCard(selectedStudent, selectedAcademicYear, selectedMonths);\n        \n        if (reportCard == null) {\n            System.out.println("No report card found for the selected criteria.");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        // Display report card\n        System.out.println("STUDENT REPORT CARD");\n        System.out.println("====================");\n        System.out.println("Student: " + reportCard.getStudentName());\n        System.out.println("Class: " + reportCard.getClassName());\n        System.out.println("Academic Year: " + reportCard.getAcademicYear());\n        System.out.println("Report Period: " + String.join(", ", reportCard.getMonths()));\n        System.out.println();\n        \n        System.out.println("ACADEMIC PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("--------------------");\n        Map<String, String> grades = reportCard.getGrades();\n        if (grades.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No grades available.");\n        } else {\n            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : grades.entrySet()) {\n                System.out.println(entry.getKey() + ": " + entry.getValue());\n            }\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("ATTENDANCE");\n        System.out.println("----------");\n        System.out.println("Days Present: " + reportCard.getDaysPresent());\n        System.out.println("Days Absent: " + reportCard.getDaysAbsent());\n        System.out.println("Attendance Rate: " + reportCard.getAttendanceRate() + "%");\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("TEACHER COMMENTS");\n        System.out.println("----------------");\n        System.out.println(reportCard.getTeacherComments());\n        \n        System.out.println();\n        System.out.println("OVERALL PERFORMANCE");\n        System.out.println("-------------------");\n        System.out.println("Overall Grade: " + reportCard.getOverallGrade());\n        System.out.println("Status: " + reportCard.getPerformanceStatus());\n        \n        System.out.println("\\n=====================================");\n        System.out.println("End of Report Card");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Postcondition: Stop connection to SMOS server\n     */\n    private static void stopSMOSConnection() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Stopping SMOS Server Connection ---");\n        if (smosServer != null) {\n            smosServer.disconnect();\n            System.out.println("Disconnected from SMOS server.");\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a student\n */\nclass Student {\n    private String studentId;\n    private String firstName;\n    private String lastName;\n    \n    public Student(String studentId, String firstName, String lastName) {\n        this.studentId = studentId;\n        this.firstName = firstName;\n        this.lastName = lastName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentId() {\n        return studentId;\n    }\n    \n    public " " + lastName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a school class\n */\nclass Class {\n    private String classId;\n    private String className;\n    private int gradeLevel;\n    private String teacherName;\n    \n    public Class(String classId, String className, int gradeLevel, String teacherName) {\n        this.classId = classId;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.gradeLevel = gradeLevel;\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassId() {\n        return classId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public int getGradeLevel() {\n        return gradeLevel;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherName() {\n        return teacherName;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing an academic year\n */\nclass AcademicYear {\n    private String yearId;\n    private String startYear;\n    private String endYear;\n    \n    public AcademicYear(String yearId, String startYear, String endYear) {\n        this.yearId = yearId;\n        this.startYear = startYear;\n        this.endYear = endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearId() {\n        return yearId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStartYear() {\n        return startYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getEndYear() {\n        return endYear;\n    }\n    \n    public String getYearRange() {\n        return startYear + "-" + endYear;\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * Class representing a report card\n */\nclass ReportCard {\n    private String studentName;\n    private String className;\n    private String academicYear;\n    private List<String> months;\n    private Map<String, String> grades;\n    private int daysPresent;\n    private int daysAbsent;\n    private String teacherComments;\n    private String overallGrade;\n    private String performanceStatus;\n    \n    public ReportCard(String studentName, String className, String academicYear, \n                     List<String> months, Map<String, String> grades,\n                     int daysPresent, int daysAbsent, String teacherComments,\n                     String overallGrade, String performanceStatus) {\n        this.studentName = studentName;\n        this.className = className;\n        this.academicYear = academicYear;\n        this.months = months;\n        this.grades = grades;\n        this.daysPresent = daysPresent;\n        this.daysAbsent = daysAbsent;\n        this.teacherComments = teacherComments;\n        this.overallGrade = overallGrade;\n        this.performanceStatus = performanceStatus;\n    }\n    \n    public String getStudentName() {\n        return studentName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getClassName() {\n        return className;\n    }\n    \n    public return grades;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysPresent() {\n        return daysPresent;\n    }\n    \n    public int getDaysAbsent() {\n        return daysAbsent;\n    }\n    \n    public double getAttendanceRate() {\n        int totalDays = daysPresent + daysAbsent;\n        return totalDays > 0 ? (double) daysPresent / totalDays * 100 : 0;\n    }\n    \n    public String getTeacherComments() {\n        return teacherComments;\n    }\n    \n    public String getOverallGrade() {\n        return Cannot retrieve academic years.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        return new ArrayList<>(academicYears);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves classes for a given academic year.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year to filter classes\n     * @return List of Class objects for the given academic year\n     */\n    public List<Class> getClassesForAcademicYear(AcademicYear academicYear) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve classes.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, all classes are available for all academic years.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by academic year.\n        return new ArrayList<>(classes);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves students for a given class.\n     * \n     * @param cls The class to filter students\n     * @return List of Student objects in the given class\n     */\n    public List<Student> getStudentsForClass(Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve students.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // In this simulation, we return all students regardless of class.\n        // In a real system, we would filter by class.\n        return new ArrayList<>(students);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves available months for report card generation based on academic year and class.\n     * \n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param cls The class\n     * @return List of available months as strings\n     */\n    public List<String> getAvailableMonths(AcademicYear academicYear, Class cls) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve available months.");\n            return new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        // Simulated available months\n        List<String> months = new ArrayList<>();\n        months.add("September");\n        months.add("October");\n        months.add("November");\n        months.add("December");\n        months.add("January");\n        months.add("February");\n        months.add("March");\n        months.add("April");\n        months.add("May");\n        months.add("June");\n        return months;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Retrieves a report card for a specific student, academic year, and months.\n     * \n     * @param student The student\n     * @param academicYear The academic year\n     * @param months The list of months for the report\n     * @return ReportCard object if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public ReportCard getReportCard(Student student, AcademicYear academicYear, List<String> months) {\n        if (!connected) {\n            System.out.println("SMOS Server: Not connected. Cannot retrieve report card.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        // Generate a key based on student ID, academic year, and months\n        String key = student.getStudentId() + "_" + academicYear.getYearRange() + "_" +\n                     String.join("-", months.subList(0, Math.min(4, months.size())));\n        \n        // Return the report card if it exists\n        return reportCards.get(key);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a new report card to the simulated database (for testing/extensibility).\n     * \n     * @param key The unique key for the report card\n     * @param reportCard The ReportCard object to add\n     */\n    public void addReportCard(String key, ReportCard reportCard) {\n        reportCards.put(key, reportCard);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns a string representation of the SMOS server status.\n     * \n     * @return String indicating connection status\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "SMOSServer [connected=" + connected + \n               ", academicYears=" + academicYears.size() +\n               ", classes=" + classes.size() +\n               ", students=" + students.size() +\n               ", reportCards=" + reportCards.size() + "]";\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. If the requirement is developing a software, game, app, or website, excluding the above data-related tasks, you should decompose the requirement into multiple tasks and assign them to different team members based on their expertise. The standard software development process has four steps: creating a Product Requirement Document (PRD) by the Product Manager -> writing a System Design by the Architect -> creating tasks by the Project Manager -> and coding by the Engineer. You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code. Otherwise, estimate if any part of the standard software development process may contribute to a better final code. If so, assign team members accordingly.\n3.1 If the task involves code review (CR) or code checking, you should assign it to Engineer.\n4. If the requirement is a common-sense, logical, or math problem, you should respond directly without assigning any task to team members.\n5. If you think the requirement is not clear or ambiguous, you should ask the user for clarification immediately. Assign tasks only after all info is clear.\n6.
